text: Nɨ kamaghɨn fogh, God uabɨra gumazibar amutɨ, me uan apaniba abɨragham, o men apaniba me abɨragham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, pura bizim, nɨ uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko Israelian mɨdorozir gumaziba inigh mɨdorozim bagh mangɨ, egh atiatingan koghɨva bar pamtem mɨsogham. God nɨn apanibar amightɨ, me nɨ abɨragham.”25:8 Hibrun akam deragha akar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
